original_text: Do not say bad things about the king. Do not even think about it! Even when you are in your bedroom, do not say bad things about rich people. A little bird might hear you. It might tell people what you have said. Do not say bad things about the king. Do not even think about it! Even when you are in your bedroom, do not say bad things about rich people. A little bird might hear you. It might tell people what you have said. Do not say bad things about the king. Do not even think about it! Even when you are in your bedroom, do not say bad things about rich people. A little bird might hear you. It might tell people what you have said. Do not say bad things about the king. Do not even think about it! Even when you are in your bedroom, do not say bad things about rich people. A little bird might hear you. It might tell people what you have said. Do not say bad things about the king.
korean_text: 심중에라도 왕을 저주하지 말며 침실에서라도 부자를 저주하지 말라 공중의 새가 그 소리를 전하고 날짐승이 그 일을 전파할 것임이니라

sentences.original_text: Do not say bad things about the king.
sentences.korean_translation: 왕에 대해 나쁜 말을 하지 말라.

sentences.original_text: Do not even think about it!
Even when you are in your bedroom,
do not say bad things about rich people.
sentences.korean_translation: 부자에 대해 나쁜 말을 하지 말라.

sentences.original_text: A little bird might hear you.
sentences.korean_translation: 작은 새가 너를 들을 수도 있다.

sentences.original_text: It might tell people what you have said.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 사람들에게 네가 말한 것을 전할 수도 있다.
